prod_short_desc: Imagine and create with LEGO® Classic bricks!
prod_long_desc:
Unleash a world of open-ended creativity and imagination with the LEGO® Classic Creative Box. Imaginative building play is easy with these bright, colorful and versatile LEGO bricks in 39 colors. There are wheels, doors, windows and eyes and a mix of special elements, plus an inspirational guide with building instructions and ideas that will help your child discover their creative building skills. This set provides three levels of building complexity and makes a great addition to existing LEGO sets.
Includes over 890 pieces in a rainbow of fun, bright colors that encourages open-ended creativity.
Features a mix of classic LEGO® bricks and special elements, including windows, doors, wheels and eyes.
Makes a great addition to any budding builder’s LEGO® collection.
This LEGO® Classic Creative Box building set allows for open-ended creativity and imagination.
Provides three levels of building complexity to suit builders on different levels.
Inspirational guide with model ideas and building instructions included in the box and online.
Visit LEGO.com/classic to find all the building instructions in this set and more. Ask your parents’ permission.
Enjoy imaginative play with this inspirational LEGO® Classic set.
Comes with a brick separator to make building and rebuilding easier.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 4-99.
